plot: Thad Beaumont would like to say he is innocent. He'd like to say he has nothing to do with the series of monstrous murders that keep coming closer to his home. But how can Thad disown the ultimate embodiment of evil that goes by the name he gave it-and signs its crimes with Thad's bloody fingerprints?________________________Alternate cover editions:New English Library, 1990New English Library Early Export Edition, 1990
characters: Thad Beaumont, Alan Pangborn, George Stark
setting: United States of America Castle Rock, Maine New Jersey Ludlow, Maine New York City, New York
